title: Foundational Research Methodologies for Technology-Mediated Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Course where pre-service teachers experience technology-enhanced learning design in science classes. Activity-centered using digital devices (tablets, laptops, etc.)

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of technology-mediated learning design (e.g., activity structuring, feedback loops).
Learners can directly implement a three-stage (plan-execute-evaluate) learning design using digital tools in science subjects.
Learners can analyze and improve the effectiveness of designed learning activities through peer assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
